item.title: BLDC Motor
item.description: Rough calculations for required characteristics Brushless motor calculation forum thread Motors to buy Several criterias to have in mind; in no particular order: Pancake shape (bigger diameter, thinner case) - more torque Smaller weight/size Smaller KV (more torque/less speed) Bigger number of poles (more torque) Price Overall power Max current and rated voltage Build quality Narrow choice motors Maytech Maytech 8626 100kv 86x26,5mm 250g T-Motor T-Motor Antigravity 5008 KV170 270mOm 6s 128g 24N28P 55.
